newsitem.title: CANADA: CHUM to acquire St. Lawrence Broadcasting.
newsitem.headline: CHUM to acquire St. Lawrence Broadcasting.

text.p: CHUM Ltd said on Wednesday it agreed to acquire the outstanding shares of St. Lawrence Broadcasting Co Ltd for an undisclosed amount.
St. Lawrence owns and operates radio stations CKLC-AM and CFLY-FM in Kingston, Ontario and CFJR-AM and CHXL-FM in Brockville, Ontario, CHUM said.
The acquisition will provide CHUM with the opportunity to provide service to that portion of Southern Ontario where it has no stations. CHUM currently has 20 stations across Canada.
The deal is subject to regulatory approval.
